One of the worst movies of all time 😂😂

Marmaduke changed my life. Marmadukes character arc of going from a drug addict to savior of the city is insanely inspiring. My two-month old son got out of his chair and applauded until his hands fell off. The subplot with Omni-Man shook me to my core. Had me quaking in my boots. Now Pete Davidson took the already good performance of Owen Wilson in the live action movie and cranked it up to 67. 
Here let me show you guys the screenplay to one of the scenes.


Marmaduke: NOO OMNI MAN WHY DID YOU KILL MY FAMILY GRRRRR
Oni mean: Are you sure?
Marmaduke: yes their dead bodies are right there
On meme: Are you sure?
Marmaduke: STOP TOYING WITH ME I WONT FALL FOR IT
UNO man: Are you sure?
Maramudke: Yes now shut up!!!!!!
Omni ma’am: Are you sure?
Marmaduke: Alright I didn’t think I’d have to do this but I’m bringing a CELEBRITY CAMEO
Markiplier: Hey everybody I’m Market pliers and today we will be playing five nights at Freddy’s
Ommnom man:  Are you sure?
Market pliers: I’m not dealing with this *Grabs Marmaduke and throws him at omniman, killing them both in a suicide bombing*


10/10 movie but would not recommend to those faint of heart.

Disgusting, just disgusting. I can tell he loves to fart, which is absolutely disgusting… and he also loves to cause natural disasters.. and he loves to eat eat eat eat eat! and after that he eats some more, and after that he eats so more! So yeah, I'm just gonna give this a 0/10….
absolutely tragic movie
I love this movie, it’s quite exquisite.

The movie is painfully so bad that critics gave it a zero and I can see why. That one scene where marmaduke  lets out a huge f*rt (I’m censoring this because it’s disgusting)  is really unnecessary and disgusting. This whole movie is disgusting, the humor is not funny, the animation is not that good and the story is just not great, it’s bad. There are no emotional moments, there was one but I wouldn’t call that emotional. I don’t know what to say about the ost but it is mid.  I get that this is a kids film but kids don’t deserve to watch this slop, they deserve something better, not a movie with unfunny and disgusting f*rt jokes. If you want to watch a film about pets or animals in general then I would recommend the Secret life of pets 1 and 2, the Garfield movie (2024), lilo and stitch or Madagascar (a actual funny film with no fart jokes). So yea, this movie is hot garbage.

When I saw this movie I thought it was going to be EP ca but it only has weird jokes about farts, flatulence and obesity. i have never seen a more attractive movie as Marmaduke. My wife threatened to divorce me if i didn't stop sleeping with my Marmaduke body pillow every night, so of course i divorced her on the spot. Marmaduke's sheer beauty is only rivaled by Garrett "The Garbage Man" Garrison. also the story is cool or whatever. i could only give it 5 stars, but i would give Marmaduke 69 if i could.

Marmaduke is an almost unwatchable movie, with it's bad animation, and humor that couldn't even grab the attention of a 2 year-old. Would not watch it ever again. It's literally rated a 0.5, get the memo.
